analysis.description:
Room1.getCurLotIndex (/unique_chucks/17/0xaf723a4b243286f061576958d1c5dcb593361428.sol#234-244) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- passed == 0

Room1.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xaf723a4b243286f061576958d1c5dcb593361428.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(to,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/17/0xaf723a4b243286f061576958d1c5dcb593361428.sol)

Room1.prepareToRewardProcess has external calls inside a loop:
	- ticket.owner.transfer(ticket.win) (/unique_chucks/17/0xaf723a4b243286f061576958d1c5dcb593361428.sol#361-363)

Room1.LIMIT should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xaf723a4b243286f061576958d1c5dcb593361428.sol#147-149)
Room1.PERCENT_RATE should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xaf723a4b243286f061576958d1c5dcb593361428.sol#151-155)
Room1.RANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xaf723a4b243286f061576958d1c5dcb593361428.sol#149-151)
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0xaf723a4b243286f061576958d1c5dcb593361428.sol#53) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable._transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0xaf723a4b243286f061576958d1c5dcb593361428.sol#61-62) is not in mixedCase
